QuestData.Title: Unyielding Fists: Trial of Stone
QuestData.Description: You have accomplished much in the short time you have been here, $n. I would not normally offer this test so soon... but I feel that you're ready.$b$bIt is time you attempted the Trial of Stone.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Master Bruised Paw, then successfully strike the Stack of Stone Blocks 5 times.
QuestData.CompletionText: This test will be trying. You will test the strength of your fists against the strength of stone. Steel yourself, $n.$b$bNot literally, of course.$b$bUnless you normally wear steel gloves... in which case, you may literally steel yourself.
QuestData.RewardText: <Master Bruised Paw bows before you.>$b$bStone quivers and breaks beneath your fists. You have the power to move mountains, if you so desire.$b$bThere is nothing more I can teach you.

Objectives.Objective: Strike the Stack of Stone Blocks
